name: wordpress-docker-dev
description: WordPress Docker Development Environment with Custom REST API Plugin

scripts.start:detach: node -e "const { getDockerCommand } = require('./scripts/start.js'); const cmd = getDockerCommand(); require('child_process').execSync(cmd + ' up -d --build', { stdio: 'inherit' })"
scripts.start:logs: node -e "const { getDockerCommand } = require('./scripts/start.js'); const cmd = getDockerCommand(); require('child_process').execSync(cmd + ' logs -f', { stdio: 'inherit' })"
scripts.start:restart: node -e "const { getDockerCommand } = require('./scripts/start.js'); const cmd = getDockerCommand(); require('child_process').execSync(cmd + ' restart', { stdio: 'inherit' })"
scripts.start:clean: node -e "const { getDockerCommand } = require('./scripts/start.js'); const cmd = getDockerCommand(); require('child_process').execSync(cmd + ' down -v --remove-orphans', { stdio: 'inherit' })"
scripts.status: node -e "const { getDockerCommand } = require('./scripts/start.js'); const cmd = getDockerCommand(); require('child_process').execSync(cmd + ' ps', { stdio: 'inherit' })"
scripts.shell:wordpress: node -e "const { getDockerCommand, isWindows } = require('./scripts/start.js'); const cmd = getDockerCommand(); const shell = isWindows() ? 'powershell' : 'bash'; require('child_process').execSync(cmd + ' exec wordpress ' + shell, { stdio: 'inherit' })"
scripts.db:shell: node -e "const { getDockerCommand } = require('./scripts/start.js'); const cmd = getDockerCommand(); require('child_process').execSync(cmd + ' exec db mysql -u wordpress -pwordpress_password', { stdio: 'inherit' })"
scripts.logs:wordpress: node -e "const { getDockerCommand } = require('./scripts/start.js'); const cmd = getDockerCommand(); require('child_process').execSync(cmd + ' logs wordpress', { stdio: 'inherit' })"
scripts.logs:db: node -e "const { getDockerCommand } = require('./scripts/start.js'); const cmd = getDockerCommand(); require('child_process').execSync(cmd + ' logs db', { stdio: 'inherit' })"
scripts.clean:all: docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f
